file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-35-06-04 - CONFIG-2 - VIDEO MONITORS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL VIDEO MONITORS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the video monitor(s). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FOR AIRCRAFT WITH 23-35-06-000-803-A 10" VIDEO MONITORS - REMOVAL VIDEO MONITORS FOR AIRCRAFT WITH 23-35-06-400-803-A 10" VIDEO MONITORS - INSTALLATION VIDEO MONITORS EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 23-35-06 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-35-06-000-803-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH VIDEO MONITORS 2. 10" VIDEO MONITORS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the 10" Video Monitors. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 RH Windscreen C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-022-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH VIDEO MONITORS (1) Loosen the screws (5) and washers (4) which attach the monitor cover (3) to the monitor (2). (2) Remove the monitor cover (3). (3) Loosen the screws (6) and washers (7) which attach the monitor (2) to its support. (4) Remove the monitor (2). (5) Disconnect the electrical connectors (1) from the monitor (2). (6) Install protection caps on the electrical connectors (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-803-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-35-06 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH VIDEO MONITORS 10" Video Monitors - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 232 7. WASHER (4) 6. SCREW (4) 1. CONNECTORS 2. MONITOR 3. MONITOR COVER 5. SCREW (2) 4. WASHER (2) 145AMM230705.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-803-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-35-06 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-35-06-400-803-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH VIDEO MONITORS 3. 10" VIDEO MONITORS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the 10" Video Monitors. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 RH Windscreen C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-022-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH VIDEO MONITORS (1) Remove the protection caps from the electrical connectors (1). (2) Connect the electrical connectors (1) to the monitor (2). (3) Put the washers (7) and fasten the screws (6) to attach the monitor (2) to its support. (4) Put the monitor cover (3) in position, put the washers (4), and fasten the screws (5).
